If you have an idea that you want to get people interested in, or if you have are working on an Ubuntu NC LoCo Team item/project post it here.  Please give list how you want people to contact you.

=== UbuCon at SELF ===

There will be an UbuCon at the Southeast Linux Fest in Spartanburg, SC - June 11-13, 2010.  Help will be needed at the UbuCon and at the Ubuntu Booth.  Please contact <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~akgraner | akgraner]]</nowiki> at ubuntu dot com.
